Table product.ImportConfigurationCopySupplierArticlesDO

Cascade Product Imports to other suppliers. Reserved for special cases in given projects

Columns 

References[1] Column Type Constraints[2] Default Comment
id bigint PK, UNIQUE, NOT_NULL nextval('"ImportConfigurationCopySupplierArticlesDO_id_seq"')  
ImportConfigurationDO importConfigurationRef bigint NOT_NULL Referenced ImportConfiguration. 
SupplierDO supplierRef bigint NOT_NULL Referenced Supplier Id 
customProcedure text NOT_NULL 'create_article_for_supplier'::text customized procedure to copy products, stocks/prices from another supplier. Required parameters: sourceSupplierId, targetSupplierID.  

[1] Not all references are enforced by a foreign key where they could.
Such "missing" foreign keys are denoted with [[ ]].

[2] Constraints:
PK : the column is part of the primary key
UNIQUE: does don't cover unique constraints and indexes defined on more than one column.

Constraints and Indexes
